longBusinessSummary: Bhageria Industries Limited manufactures and trades in dyes, dye intermediates, and organic and basic chemicals in India and internationally. The company is also engaged in the generation and distribution of solar power; and provision of engineering, procurement, and commissioning/construction contractor services. It exports its products to Spain, South Korea, Japan, Taiwan, China, Indonesia, Thailand, Turkey, Mexico, the United States, Germany, Rest of Europe, and Africa. The company was formerly known as Bhageria Dye Chem Limited and changed its name to Bhageria Industries Limited in August 2015. Bhageria Industries Limited was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Mumbai, India.
